main event: A civilian observed an object resembling a balloon that burst in Kirkwood, Missouri on November 1, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as having a parachute-like shape on top with metallic cords,The observer estimated the size to be similar to a basketball held at arm's length,There was no noise heard during the sighting,The object moved rapidly toward the west and disappeared almost instantaneously,The report concluded that the sighting was likely caused by a balloon released earlier that day.
witness description: A 35-year-old male living in Manchester, Missouri who seemed preoccupied with the unusual sighting.
